thread.title: Life | Pics: Man found dead mouse in his Subway sandwich
thread.title_full: Life | Pics: Man found dead mouse in his Subway sandwich - entertainment.ie

author: Jason Brennan
title: Life | Pics: Man found dead mouse in his Subway sandwich
text:
Meh, we're still going to eat there.
A Subway in Lincoln City, Oregon, has made headlines for all the wrong reasons, after a customer found a dead mouse in one of their sandwiches.
Look at that Beast of a mouse in the spinach at Subway today! Good thing we didn't bite into it! AMAZING! WTF!!! The manager was in shock!
Posted by Matt Jones on Tuesday, 6 October 2015 Matt Jones, the customer in question, told KGW “It’s the funniest thing I’ve ever seen, but it’s also the most disgusting thing I’ve ever seen”.
“I laughed because I was like, there is no way this just happened.”
The Health Department has already been called to the restaurant, but their findings have led them to believe the rodent came in a package of spinach delivered to the store, and wasn't from an infestation within the building.
A spokesperson from Subway has told KGW that "As soon as the customer alerted the owner about what happened, they were immediately given a full refund and an investigation was launched. To be cautious, all of the products in the sandwich unit were disposed of and a thorough cleaning took place, in which the Health Department gave the restaurant a clean bill of health. There were no other complaints made".
Via Death and Taxes
